Introduction

Karam is a South Korean singer and actor under New Ways Company. He is a member of the boy group ASC2NT, and a former member of the boy groups XING and DGNA, as well as its sub-unit Popsicle.

He made his solo debut on June 8, 2018, with the Japanese single album "Rise Up".

In 2022, he took on his “first major role in a drama series” with “Happy Ending Romance,” marking a significant step in his acting career. Prior to this, he had made his acting debut through the Japanese film "Be Crazy About Me," an adaptation of the popular manga “Ai Ore!”
